properties.name: Vol. 4. Plate, M. [Map bound by Greenwood Cemetery, City Line, Forty-Fourth St., Fifth Ave.; Including Thirty-Seventh St., Thirty-Eighth St., Thirty-Ninth St., Fortieth St., Forty-First St., Forty-Second St., Forty-Third St., Sixth Ave., Seventh Ave., Ei
